text:
The provisions of this Article shall not be construed to abridge, modify or alter the powers granted to any department or commission by any other provisions of the Charter or this Code. 
(Formerly Sec. 23.8; added by Ord. No. 7919 (1939), Sec. 10; amended and renumbered by Ord. 15-01, File No. 001965, App. 2/2/2001. Former Sec. 23.11 was renumbered as 23.14 by Ord. 15-01.)

heading.catch_text: POWERS GRANTED DEPARTMENTS BY CHARTER OR CODE NOT ABRIDGED.
